MemberSignature.Value: public void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (string targetDomainName, System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword);

.method public hidebysig instance void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName, valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.TrustDirection direction, string trustPassword) cil managed
Public Sub CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship (targetDomainName As String, direction As TrustDirection, trustPassword As String)
public: void CreateLocalSideOfTrustRelationship(System::String ^ targetDomainName, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::TrustDirection direction, System::String ^ trustPassword);

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

span.span: The DNS name of the domain that the trust is created with.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

param.name: trustPassword
param.span: The password for the trust.

span.span: The password for the trust.

summary.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates the local side of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método cria um dos lados de uma relação de confiança.This method creates one side of a trust relationship. A relação de confiança não é estabelecida até que ambos os lados da relação de confiança foram criados.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created. O `trustPassword` parâmetro associa uma senha com a relação de confiança criada.The `trustPassword` parameter associates a password with the created trust. Quando o outro lado da relação de confiança é criado, a mesma senha é fornecida e as duas relações de confiança locais, em seguida, são vinculadas uns aos outros.When the other side of the trust is created, the same password is provided and the two local trusts are then bound to each other. Para criar programaticamente os dois lados de uma relação de confiança em uma única chamada de método, use o método.To programmatically create both sides of a trust relationship in a single method call, use the method.

exception.span: The trust relationship already exists.

span.span: The trust relationship already exists.

exception.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

span.span: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

exception.span: The target server is either busy or unavailable.

exception.span: or is empty.

param.name: direction
param.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

span.span: One of the members that determines the direction of the trust, relative to this domain.

summary.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

span.span: Creates both sides of a trust relationship with the specified domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método cria os dois lados de uma relação de confiança com uma única chamada de método.This method creates both sides of a trust relationship with a single method call. O método é usado para criar apenas um dos lados de uma relação de confiança.The method is used to create only one side of a trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers() cil managed

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Você pode encontrar os controladores de domínio detectáveis consultando registros SRV do DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Somente os controladores de domínio que registre o genérico, não específico de site, o registro SRV do controlador de domínio serão retornados por esse método.Only those domain controllers that register the generic, non-site-specific, domain controller SRV record will be returned by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainControllerCollection FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers(string siteName) cil managed
Public Function FindAllDiscoverableDomainControllers (siteName As String) As DomainControllerCollection

param.name: siteName
param.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

span.span: The name of the site to search for the domain controllers.

summary.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

span.span: Finds all of the discoverable domain controllers in this domain that are also in the specified site.

returns.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

span.span: A that contains the domain controller objects that were found by this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Você pode encontrar os controladores de domínio detectáveis consultando registros SRV do DNS.You can find discoverable domain controllers by querying DNS SRV records. Se um controlador de domínio não registra um registro SRV para o site especificado, ele não será retornado por esse método, mesmo se o controlador de domínio estiver localizado fisicamente dentro desse site.If a domain controller does not register an SRV record for the specified site, it will not be returned by this method, even if the domain controller is physically located within that site. Todos os controladores de domínio que se registram um registro SRV para o site especificado serão retornados por esse método, mesmo se eles não estão fisicamente localizados dentro desse site.All domain controllers that register an SRV record for the specified site will be returned by this method, even if they are not physically located within that site.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetComputerDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetComputerDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

span.span: Gets the object that represents the domain to which the local computer is joined.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

span.span: A object that represents the domain to which the local machine is joined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O valor de retorno de método é um objeto que representa o domínio ao qual o computador que executa o aplicativo está associado.The return value of the method is a object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined. Esse valor de retorno é independente das credenciais de domínio sob a qual o aplicativo é executado.This return value is independent of the domain credentials under which the application is run. Esse método recupera o domínio do computador, independentemente das credenciais de domínio de conta confiável que ele é executado em.This method will retrieve the computer's domain regardless of the trusted account domain credentials it is run under. Para recuperar o objeto que representa o domínio correspondente ao usuário as credenciais em vigor para o contexto de segurança sob a qual o aplicativo está em execução, use o método em vez disso.To retrieve the object that represents the domain corresponding to the user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running, use the method instead.

exception.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the domain could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.Domain GetCurrentDomain() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetCurrentDomain () As Domain

summary.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: Gets the object for the current user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

returns.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

span.span: A object that represents the domain for the specified user credentials in effect for the security context under which the application is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks método é determinado pelas credenciais de domínio sob a qual o aplicativo está em execução. method is determined by the domain credentials under which the application is running. Para recuperar o objeto que representa o domínio ao qual o computador que executa o aplicativo tiver sido adicionado, independentemente das credenciais associadas a esse aplicativo, use o método em vez disso.To retrieve the object representing the domain to which the computer running the application is joined, regardless of the credentials associated with that application, use the method instead. ## Consulte tambémSee Also

exception.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

span.span: A connection to the current context could not be made.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RaiseDomainFunctionality(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DomainMode domainMode) cil managed

param.name: domainMode
param.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

span.span: An enumeration value that specifies the new operation level for the domain.

summary.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

span.span: Raises the mode of operation for the domain.

remarks.format:
## Remarks O valor pode ser gerado, mas não reduzida.The value can be raised but not lowered. Isso significa que não é reversível elevar o nível de funcionalidade do domínio e a decisão de fazer isso deve ser feita com cuidado.This means that raising the functionality level of the domain is not reversible and the decision to do this should be made carefully. Para obter mais informações sobre os modos operacionais do domínio, consulte [funcionalidade de domínio e floresta](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp).For more information about domain operational modes, see [Domain and forest functionality](http://www.microsoft.com/resources/documentation/WindowsServ/2003/standard/proddocs/en-us/sag_levels.asp). A tabela a seguir define os valores válidos para `domainMode` com base no modo de operação atual do domínio.The following table defines the valid values for `domainMode` based on the current operating mode of the domain. |Modo atualCurrent mode|Modo pode ser aumentado para oMode can be raised to| |------------------|---------------------------| ||



| ||| ||| ||NenhumNone|

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método repara a relação de confiança, redefinir o canal seguro para a relação de confiança.This method repairs the trust by resetting the secure channel for the trust. Se a operação falhar redefinir o canal seguro, em seguida, também redefinirá a senha de confiança.If the operation fails to reset the secure channel, then it will also reset the trust password.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VerifyOutboundTrustRelationship(string targetDomainName) cil managed

param.name: targetDomainName
param.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

span.span: The DNS name of the domain with which the trust exists.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established outbound trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método é usado para verificar se uma relação de confiança foi estabelecida totalmente.This method is used to verify that a trust relationship has been fully established. A relação de confiança não é estabelecida até que ambos os lados da relação de confiança foram criados.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.

param.span: A object that represents the domain with which the trust exists.

param.span: A value that specifies the direction, relative to this domain, of the trust.

summary.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

span.span: Verifies that a previously established trust with the specified domain is valid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esse método verifica se uma relação de confiança foi totalmente estabelecida.This method verifies that a trust relationship has been fully established. A relação de confiança não é estabelecida até que ambos os lados da relação de confiança foram criados.The trust is not established until both sides of the trust have been created.
